name: Ultimate Zoomman
description:
Description: A pacman style minigame I made for fun, featuring procedurally generated world + Dijkstra's algorithm.

Controls: Arrow keys to move. Press Z to zoom out. 

Credits:

8 bit SFX: Evan King, https://www.evankingmusic.com/

Sprites: LimeZu, https://limezu.itch.io/21rpg-battlers

Future plans: (Only in idea stage)

1. Make more levels

2. More game mechanics, e.g. invincible tile, trap tile, battle mechanics (shooting stars), etc.

3. Original art + animation
